verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses בֹּ֖א <S%H935><s%> bo Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh; unto Pharaoh וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> shal-Lach go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5647><s%> ve-Ya-'av-Du-ni. that they may serve

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if מָאֵ֥ן <S%H3986><s%> ma-'En And if thou refuse אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you לְשַׁלֵּ֑חַ <S%H7971><s%> le-shal-Le-ach; to let [them] go הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi, I נֹגֵ֛ף <S%H5062><s%> no-Gef behold I will smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- your whole גְּבוּלְךָ֖ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-le-Cha all thy borders בַּֽצְפַרְדְּעִֽים׃ <S%H6854><s%> Batz-far-de-'Im. with frogs

וְשָׁרַ֣ץ <S%H8317><s%> ve-sha-Ratz abundantly הַיְאֹר֮ <S%H2975><s%> hay-'Or And the river צְפַרְדְּעִים֒ <S%H6854><s%> tze-far-de-'Im frogs וְעָלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lu which shall go up וּבָ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-'u and come בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Te-cha, into thine house וּבַחֲדַ֥ר <S%H2315><s%> u-va-cha-Dar chamber מִשְׁכָּבְךָ֖ <S%H4904><s%> mish-ka-ve-Cha bed וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and on מִטָּתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4296><s%> mit-ta-Te-cha; and upon thy bed וּבְבֵ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> u-ve-Veit and into the house עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha of thy servants וּבְעַמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5971><s%> u-ve-'am-Me-cha, and upon thy people וּבְתַנּוּרֶ֖יךָ <S%H8574><s%> u-ve-tan-nu-Rei-cha and into thine ovens וּבְמִשְׁאֲרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4863><s%> u-ve-mish-'a-ro-Tei-cha. and into thy kneadingtroughs

וּבְכָ֥ה u-ve-Chah וּֽבְעַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> u-ve-'am-me-Cha both on thee and upon thy people וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol and all עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha; and upon all thy servants יַעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu shall come up הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִֽים׃ <S%H6854><s%> Hatz-far-de-'Im. And the frogs

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁה֒ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor Say אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron נְטֵ֤ה <S%H5186><s%> ne-Teh Stretch forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha thine hand בְּמַטֶּ֔ךָ <S%H4294><s%> be-mat-Te-cha, with thy rod עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַ֨נְּהָרֹ֔ת <S%H5104><s%> han-ne-ha-Rot, over the streams עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַיְאֹרִ֖ים <S%H2975><s%> hay-'o-Rim over the rivers וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and over הָאֲגַמִּ֑ים <S%H98><s%> ha-'a-gam-Mim; and over the ponds וְהַ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> ve-Ha-'al to come up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <S%H6854><s%> hatz-far-de-'Im and cause frogs עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz upon the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַיֵּ֤ט <S%H5186><s%> vai-Yet stretched out אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron And Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do, his hand עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over מֵימֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> mei-Mei over the waters מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וַתַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> vat-Ta-'al came up הַצְּפַרְדֵּ֔עַ <S%H6854><s%> hatz-tze-far-De-a', and the frogs וַתְּכַ֖ס <S%H3680><s%> vat-te-Chas and covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-su- did כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> chen the same הַֽחֲרְטֻמִּ֖ים <S%H2748><s%> ha-char-tum-Mim And the magicians בְּלָטֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3909><s%> be-la-tei-Hem; so with their enchantments וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu and brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <S%H6854><s%> hatz-far-de-'Im frogs עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz upon the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called פַרְעֹ֜ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh Then Pharaoh לְמֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> le-mo-Sheh for Moses וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> u-le-'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said הַעְתִּ֣ירוּ <S%H6279><s%> ha'-Ti-ru Intreat אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD וְיָסֵר֙ <S%H5493><s%> ve-ya-Ser that he may take away הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <S%H6854><s%> hatz-far-de-'Im, the frogs מִמֶּ֖נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni and from וּמֵֽעַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> u-me-'am-Mi; from me and from my people וַאֲשַׁלְּחָה֙ <S%H7971><s%> va-'a-shal-le-Chah go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, and I will let the people וְיִזְבְּח֖וּ <S%H2076><s%> ve-yiz-be-Chu that they may do sacrifice לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses לְפַרְעֹה֮ <S%H6547><s%> le-far-'Oh unto Pharaoh הִתְפָּאֵ֣ר <S%H6286><s%> hit-pa-'Er Glory עָלַי֒ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai and לְמָתַ֣י׀ <S%H4970><s%> le-ma-Tai over me when אַעְתִּ֣יר <S%H6279><s%> 'a'-Tir shall I intreat לְךָ֗ le-Cha, וְלַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> ve-la-'a-va-Dei-cha for thee and for thy servants וּֽלְעַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> u-le-'am-me-Cha, and for thy people לְהַכְרִית֙ <S%H3772><s%> le-hach-Rit to destroy הַֽצֲפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <S%H6854><s%> ha-tza-far-de-'Im, the frogs מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> mi-me-Cha at וּמִבָּתֶּ֑יךָ <S%H1004><s%> u-mib-bat-Tei-cha; from thee and thy houses רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> rak in בַּיְאֹ֖ר <S%H2975><s%> bay-'Or in the river תִּשָּׁאַֽרְנָה׃ <S%H7604><s%> tish-sha-'Ar-nah. [that] they may remain

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לְמָחָ֑ר <S%H4279><s%> le-ma-Char; To morrow וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said כִּדְבָ֣רְךָ֔ <S%H1697><s%> kid-Va-re-cha, [Be it] according to thy word לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that תֵּדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> te-Da', that thou mayest know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there כַּיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that [there is] none like unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our God

וְסָר֣וּ <S%H5493><s%> ve-sa-Ru shall depart הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֗ים <S%H6854><s%> hatz-far-de-'Im, And the frogs מִמְּךָ֙ <S%H4480><s%> mi-me-Cha at וּמִבָּ֣תֶּ֔יךָ <S%H1004><s%> u-mib-Bat-Tei-cha, from thee and from thy houses וּמֵעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> u-me-'a-va-Dei-cha and from thy servants וּמֵעַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> u-me-'am-Me-cha; and from thy people רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> rak in בַּיְאֹ֖ר <S%H2975><s%> bay-'Or in the river תִּשָּׁאַֽרְנָה׃ <S%H7604><s%> tish-sha-'Ar-nah. they shall remain

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron and Aaron מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im from פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh; from Pharaoh וַיִּצְעַ֤ק <S%H6817><s%> vai-yitz-'Ak cried מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh and Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var because of הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <S%H6854><s%> hatz-far-de-'Im the frogs אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> sam which he had brought לְפַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> le-far-'Oh. against Pharaoh

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as did יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var according to the word מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; of Moses וַיָּמֻ֙תוּ֙ <S%H4191><s%> vai-ya-Mu-tu died הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <S%H6854><s%> hatz-far-de-'Im, and the frogs מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- out הַבָּתִּ֥ים <S%H1004><s%> hab-bat-Tim out of the houses מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַחֲצֵרֹ֖ת <S%H2691><s%> ha-cha-tze-Rot out of the villages וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- at הַשָּׂדֹֽת׃ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Dot. and out of the fields

וַיִּצְבְּר֥וּ <S%H6651><s%> vai-yitz-be-Ru And they gathered them together אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam חֳמָרִ֣ם <S%H2563><s%> cho-ma-Rim upon heaps חֳמָרִ֑ם <S%H2563><s%> cho-ma-Rim; heaps וַתִּבְאַ֖שׁ <S%H887><s%> vat-tiv-'Ash stank הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. and the land

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, But when Pharaoh כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah there was הָֽרְוָחָ֔ה <S%H7309><s%> ha-re-va-Chah, that there was respite וְהַכְבֵּד֙ <S%H3513><s%> ve-hach-Bed he hardened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo, his heart וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and did not שָׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' and hearkened אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem; about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber had said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. not unto them as the LORD ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁה֒ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses אֱמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor Say אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron נְטֵ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> ne-Teh Stretch out אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַטְּךָ֔ <S%H4294><s%> mat-te-Cha, thy rod וְהַ֖ךְ <S%H5221><s%> ve-Hach and smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲפַ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> 'a-Far the dust הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah may become לְכִנִּ֖ם <S%H3654><s%> le-chin-Nim that it may become lice בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt
